dialog: Is Friday at 6 PM good for you?
Definitely, I'll cast a spell to reserve that time for you.
Awesome, I'll be there then. Thank you!
Today I'd like to discuss with you the magical insurance options that might interest you.
That sounds great! I was wondering if I could get both life and health insurance.
Sure thing! You'll get 2 weeks of paid vacation each year and a 5-day workweek.
Perfect. Is there anything else included?
Yes, all your insurance will be tied to your work. We'll also provide you with an enchanted insurance policy.
Next up, how may I assist you, wizard?
I'd like to send a registered airmail letter to France, please.
Got it, that will be 4 dollars and 20 cents.
Here's 5 dollars.
Here's your change. You will receive a receipt of the registered mail soon.
Oh, and I also need to send this package. This is the note for it.
Let me take a look... just a moment. Here it is. I'll need you to sign this note.
And one more thing, where can I mail this letter?
Just drop it in the out of town mailbox at that corner.
Thanks a lot!
You're welcome, wizard. It was a pleasure assisting you.
Wow, we were really lucky. We got the last available table for two without even having a reservation! Did you see the long line of people behind us?
